/apps/well/openmpi/1.10.3-gcc5.4.0/bin/mpicxx   -O3 -DNDEBUG     CMakeFiles/display.dir/display.cpp.o  -o ../../bin/relion_display -Wl,-rpath,/users/strubi/serban/well/apps/relion-2.0-relax-patch/relion/build/lib:/users/strubi/serban/well/apps/relion-2.0-relax-patch/relion/external/fftw/lib:/apps/well/openmpi/1.10.3-gcc5.4.0/lib:/users/strubi/serban/well/apps/relion-2.0-relax-patch/relion/external/fltk/lib: -rdynamic ../../lib/librelion_lib.so ../../../external/fftw/lib/libfftw3.so /apps/well/openmpi/1.10.3-gcc5.4.0/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /apps/well/openmpi/1.10.3-gcc5.4.0/lib/libmpi.so -ldl -lm -lrt -lnsl -lutil -lm -ldl -ldl ../../../external/fltk/lib/libfltk.so -lrt -lnsl -lutil -ldl ../../../external/fltk/lib/libfltk.so
